company: I have built backend services and REST APIs using Node.js and Flask and frontend apps using React.js, which will be useful for integrating performance reports into a web interface.
I have worked with MAKE and Docker and I am familiar with Windows, Linux, and FreeBSD, which is crucial for ensuring compatibility in this project.
Experience in GitHub Actions for setting up workflows and automating tests.

I analyzed real-world datasets (e.g, government survey reports) using Python libraries like NumPy and Pandas, and bring insights to life with Matplotlib and Seaborn—turning raw data into compelling visual stories.
I’m building a solid foundation in DSA and exploring core machine learning algorithms—sharpening my problem-solving skills and learning how smart systems think.
